metadata.Title: CVE-2016-7073 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue has been found in PowerDNS before 3.4.11 and 4.0.2, and PowerDNS recursor before 4.0.4, allowing an attacker in position of man-in-the-middle to alter the content of an AXFR because of insufficient validation of TSIG signatures. A missing check of the TSIG time and fudge values was found in AXFRRetriever, leading to a possible replay attack.

criterions.comment: pdns: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
pdns-recursor: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
